pages.title: Inward
pages.text: Cost: Spell + Ender Eye$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br2)XP Cost: 16$(br2)A easy spell to make and use, when striking an entity, it will give them the 'Inward' status effect

When you cast the spell, a projectile will be thrown from your body, upon striking another entity, it will give them the 'Inward' status effect, a very useful effect for combat against other mages as it causes all of their successful spells to forcefully hit themselves
